query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS approved_drafts (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  processId INT,
  conversationId INT,
  messageId INT,
  originalDraft TEXT NOT NULL,
  editedDraft TEXT,
  draftType VARCHAR(50),
  approvalStatus VARCHAR(50),
  feedback TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 7gDrDqW7jwFKyJS.c06df48d9daf --database BtzVqJQrEpT2bFpeKB5YVk --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS approved_drafts (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  processId INT,
  conversationId INT,
  messageId INT,
  originalDraft TEXT NOT NULL,
  editedDraft TEXT,
  draftType VARCHAR(50),
  approvalStatus VARCHAR(50),
  feedback TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
)
